Removed the "Read Coverage" button from the deployments page. It used a placeholder link (`[[awaiting coverage link]]`), so it wasn't working.

The section now only shows the "Watch Video" button. The CSS uses flexbox, so the layout works with a single button. No other references to "Read Coverage" were found in the codebase.
